an actual spin
doctor on our track

and The Stig laps
a Reliant Robin.
Hello.
Hello. Good evening. Hello.
Now...
Now, as we know,

as we know, track days
these days are very popular.

The idea is that you drive

horrible branded shirt...

...like,
for example, this one,

and then you drive around as fast as
possible all day and then you go home.

Today, track days

you can even buy specialised

Thing is, this costs £45,000,

No, so, to address this,

the producers gave us each

and they told us to buy four-door
saloons that could be used every day

but that would also be good
on a track day.

And because the challenges
they had in mind were quite serious,

they told us to meet up in
the world's least amusing city.
Yep, it was Berlin.

I was the first to arrive,
and as you would imagine,

I had done
everything properly.

This is

- Yes.

So you've
